comments.body: I think it's time to move this method to Cloudstack module utils.

@dpassante I agree on it too. I wanted to do it in one of the previous PR's but it got quite messy. I want to put it in there because I've got pending changes in `cs_vlan_ip_range` and a new `cs_traffic_type` module that both need it. Although I would still need to override it in this module - the same case with `get_network` method and `cs_network` module.

You can check the code here: https://github.com/ansible/ansible/pull/54020/files#diff-96da40a9131629a9034804485b0d0808 I'll resubmit it once this PR is merged.
